attributes.action: abolish London to Paris and Brussels flights in favour of using the Eurostar, in a bid to help tackle climate change.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We want to abolish London (Heathrow) to Paris (CDG) and London to Brussels flights in favour of a carbon neutral Eurostar train journey. These train tickets cost very nearly the same (under £10 more expensive and in some cases cheaper). These journeys are from city centre to city centre. So there is no travelling outside of the cities to the airports incuring a bigger carbon footprint. The Eurostar London-Paris and London-Brussels routes should also be given a IATA rating allowing British Airways and SN Brussels airlines to withdraw their air services between the cities.
